ygData.subject: RE: Patch Update today
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Along this train of thought... All of the times that I appeared to break root with Selos, I had not been playing Selos before they rooted me.  Also for
ygData.messageBody:
>Perhaps it has to do with whether Accelerando is currently up at the >time.
>Maybe if you have it up when you get rooted, you can't break it with
>accel,
>but if you aren't singing it when you're rooted, it will break it. >It
>wouldn't be too far fetched considering the weirdness involved with >these
>interactions we've seen in the past.


Along this train of thought... All of the times that I 'appeared' to break
root with Selos, I had not been playing Selos before they rooted me. Also
for the record. At 21st level, all of rooters were blue...

Sevin Tercet 22nd Human Bard
on Brell
